game_description: TrailBouncer is a fast-paced VR racing game where breathtaking locomotion meets ultra-fast ball handling in a stunning and surreal environment. A steep learning curve pushes players to master the challenging environments with rapid interactions that constantly challenge their skills and reflexes. Race at lightning speed through different zones in a mythical environment. Race and spin up and down the mountains while going over boost pads to be even faster. Strive to unlock all levels and stay at the top of the game by using power-ups to your advantage and achieve the highest rank among your fellow players.
review_1: I'd like to be able to grab the ball instead of cradling it.
review_2: but this game really works for me! Basically this is a speedrun game where you have a glowing ball that you dribble to gain speed. Grab the ball to slow down or turn. It's quite challenging!
review_3: I have a lot of fun with this fast game.
